md:
giải nghĩa từ "heavy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

heavy /ˈhevi/

* Adjective:
	+ Nặng (talking about weight or seriousness)
		+ Ví dụ: "This box is heavy, I need help to lift it."
	+ Trầm trọng (talking about a serious or severe situation)
		+ Ví dụ: "The heavy rain caused a lot of damage to the city."
	+ Cứng (talking about a difficult or hard task)
		+ Ví dụ: "The heavy workload made me feel exhausted."
* Noun:
	+ (In boxing) A heavyweight boxer
		+ Ví dụ: "The heavy fought against the lightweight champion."
* Verb:
	+ Làm nặng (to make something heavier)
		+ Ví dụ: "The extra weight will heavy the bag."
	+ (In informal contexts) To make someone or something feel sad or depressed
		+ Ví dụ: "The news of her death heavyed my heart."

Từ liên quan:

* Heavily: Rất nặng, rất trầm trọng
* Heaviness: Trọng lượng, sự trầm trọng
* Heavy-handed: Tay nặng, quá mạnh tay
* Heavy-hearted: Đau lòng, buồn bã

Note: The word "heavy" can have different meanings depending on the context, so it's essential to understand the nuances of the word to use it correctly.

    • (In informal contexts) To make someone or something feel sad or depressed
